name: Monique Marins
bio: I'm a true data enthusiastic and passionate about data science storytelling. I'm motivated and obsessed by designing and building AI applications - making it real! In recent years, I've been involved in several projects within AI umbrella, Natural Language Processing is a field that fascinates and always presents new challenges. My hobby is investments - I love the fact my money is working for me while I'm working. My background is in Economics and Finance which combined with AI provided me a solid foundation and tools to make good decisions when it comes to where I invest my money.
